name: CleverDog
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Clever Dog camera, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your Clever Dog camera using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is Clever Dog and login in it, search all device of camera. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable Clever Dog camera skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap DISCOVER DEVICES in Alexa app to discover your Clever Dog camera.
4. Setting for camera in Alexa app: open camera Press, open unlock by app and setting unlock password, open unlock by voice.

After linking your Clever Dog account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control camera to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show camera 3"

if you want stop the Clever Dog camera from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"

if you want open lock from Clever Dog camera, you can say:
Alexa, unlock camera 3
Alexa will ask you what is your voice code
we can say:"1234", the "1234" is default setting voice code.
the alexa will say:" door open" 

Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

Important Notes:
the camera support two way talk from Alexa to camera.
when you use this skill, you need to specify the name of your camera.

more information you can visit http://cleverdog.com.cn/
if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: http://cleverdog.com.cn/services/contact/
